snippet.title: Katie Holmes Earns "Mom" Title from Tom's Kids
snippet.description: Katie Holmes revealed to Parade Magazine this week that her hubby Tom Cruise's kids (with ex-wife Nicole Kidman), Isabella, 15 and Conner, 12, call her 'Mom.' She says her two stepchildren are 'incredible,...

snippet.title: Cruising With Young Children
snippet.description: Cruises are a great family vacation. By day, you spend quality time together as a family. By night, couples get some well deserved alone time, while their children party in the kids club or with in-cabin babysitters.
